sub.description: The user whose identity is shared and whose resources are accessed.

aud.description: The ID of the OIDC client application.

auth_time.description: The timestamp for the event in which the user most recently logged in to Synapse.

email_verified.description: The user's email address and a synonym for 'email', since the email is always verified.

team.description: The id(s) of Synapse teams the subject is a member of, taken from a list of IDs presented by the client.

userid.description: The immutable principal ID referencing the Synapse user.
